title: See the close-up photos of Trump's circle that shocked the internet
shortDescription: See the Vanity Fair photos that are causing a stir online showing every detail of Trump's inner circle.

title: Trump can't shake the Epstein files
shortDescription: The Epstein files saga has exposed the limits of President Trump's sway over his MAGA base.

title: Trump admin moves to cut access to gender-affirming care for minors
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced the Trump administration is taking steps to further restrict gender-affirming care for minors.

title: GOP healthcare bill clears House
shortDescription: The House of Representatives approved the GOP healthcare bill 216-211, sparking debate over premiums and ACA tax credits.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump plays the blame game
shortDescription: President delivers triumphant address. But are troubles ahead? Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: How Epstein 'took over everything else' in Trump's second term
shortDescription: Six months of tawdry revelations and unusually staunch MAGA resistance reaches a major milestone Friday: DOJ's deadline to release the Epstein files.

title: See President Trump address the nation from the White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke from the White House on Wednesday, Dec. 17 as he nears the end of his first year back in office.

title: Donald Trump's prime-time speech, word for word: Read what he said
shortDescription: Donald Trump touted his accomplishments in a Dec. 17 primetime address. Read what he said.

title: Trump plays affordability blame game: 5 takeaways from his TV address
shortDescription: "Boy are we making progress," Trump said in a speech focused heavily on the affordability question that has increasingly bedeviled his administration.

title: Trump promises $1,776 'Warrior Dividend' checks for military this Christmas
shortDescription: The president says the dividend checks come from his stepped-up tariff program and that service members should get their checks before Christmas

title: A triumphant Trump today but troubles ahead. Happy new year?
shortDescription: As the president addresses the nation, unemployment is edging up, his job approval is edging down. And the midterms? Don't ask.

title: Trump to announce 'aggressive' housing reform
shortDescription: President Trump said in his national address that he will announce the "most aggressive" housing reform plans in 2026.

title: Trump announces $1,776 'warrior dividend'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced that his administration is giving out $1,776 “warrior dividend” checks to military service members before Christmas.

title: Trump’s ballroom project can proceed for now, judge rules
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Richard Leon denied the National Trust’s bid for a temporary restraining order, saying it failed to show “irreparable harm" now.

title: See the new White House 'Presidential Walk of Fame' plaques
shortDescription: Newly installed plaques summarizing the legacies of former US Presidents, as interpreted by the Trump White House, have been installed at the White House.

title: Trump salutes fallen troops at Dover
shortDescription: President Donald Trump saluted fallen Iowa National Guard soldiers at Dover Air Force Base.

title: Trump attends Dover ceremony for fallen Iowa National Guard soldiers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attends a dignified transfer of the remains of two slain Iowa National Guard members and a civilian interpreter at Dover Air Force Base on Dec. 17, 2025.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? See polls as he gives year-end address
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is giving a White House address. His speech is expected to cover his near-year in office. What do the polls say about him?

title: En medio del conflicto con Venezuela, Trump declara al fentanilo 'arma de destrucción masiva'
shortDescription: Trump justifica sanciones y ataques contra Venezuela por narcotráfico, pero datos oficiales revelan que el fentanilo que mata en EE. UU. no proviene del país.

title: Trump attends transfer of 2 National Guard troops killed in Syria
shortDescription: Trump traveled to Delaware to attend the dignified transfer of two National Guard troops who were killed in Syria by an Islamic State gunman.
